title: No Regrets
body:
Daily Writing Challenge by @ sdavid09  -  Prompt #8:

Prompt:
What is your character’s greatest regret?

Pairing: Tony Stark x reader

Author’s note: I already kinda wrote a fic about Tony’s regrets? Also, I really wanted to write something happier than all the ideas that came to my mind when I read the prompt, sooo… Here is some sugar-daddy!Tony AU :)

Warnings: use of foul language, sex scenes, not very Steve Rogers friendly 

MASTERLIST

__________________________________________________________

No Regrets

People say that he should be ashamed of himself, dating a girl half his age. They say that it’s simply disgusting, an old man like him sleeping with such a young girl. He probably makes her do things she doesn’t want to do, they say. He will use her, taint her and leave like a garbage for a younger, prettier. And she will be alone, broken.

*

It happens during one of the most boring galas Tony has ever attended. He shook hands with every rich person there, exchanged pleasantries armed with hidden edges and spikes and is now making his usual rounds. He keeps looking for Y/N, who disappeared a few minutes ago and hasn’t reappeared yet. Jealousy, which he is not sure he even should feel, burns in his chest, consuming him. There are many younger, more handsome men here, who would not be opposed to entering this sort of relationship with her that Tony himself has. He wouldn’t be surprised…

There is a hand on his arm and Y/N sways gently towards him, her lips curved into an alluring smile. She puts something in his buttonhole while she pretends to smooth over his suit and then kisses his cheek and leaves him again, having apparently seen somebody she recognizes.  

Tony puts his hand into his buttonhole and picks up some piece of material. For a moment he doesn’t understand, the gears in his head for once dead, still. Then the realization dawns on him and the long-forgotten feeling of a hot blush crawling up his face surprises him, as he whips his head towards her.  

She is looking at him over her shoulder, still walking towards what he can see is a ‘staff only’ room, a flirtatious smile on her sinful lips. His feet start walking towards her without his conscious agreement and in his hand he clutches a pair of red-and-gold panties…

***

People say that she is a slut, dating him only for his money. “A whore”, mutter the shocked housewives, hungrily watching TV shows about scandals and rumours from Hollywood. “How can he think she’s with him for anything else, she probably demands money after every night they spend together.”

*

She doesn’t like Steve Rogers much, even though many consider him a paragon of virtue. She rarely stays in the same room as he, even more rarely talks with him. She tries to stay out of his way as much as she can. She eyes him distrustfully when he argues with Tony, huffs with displeasure when he asks for updates on his uniform and ostentatiously leaves  when he tries to talk with her about her relationship with Stark.  

But when Steve during one of the outings, in full WWII uniform and in his Captain America voice, asks what Tony without his suit is, she SNAPS and slaps him across the face, spitting out a speech about deserts, needles and cacti. Both Steve and Tony are shocked, the soldier more at the force of the hit and Tony… Tony is surprised that she would think to defend him at all. So much that he misses the apology Steve mutters quietly and the appreciative glances Natasha keeps giving Y/N.  

Y/N gives Steve one more glare, catches Tony by his arm and takes him home and to the workshop, where she spends the next few hours playing with DUM-e and watching Tony create new marvels, seemingly out of nothing.

*

He doesn’t regret this. Not when she is laying on the bed, bound by her wrists to the headboard, clad only in the dark red lingerie he bought specially for this. She is ready for him, panting and moaning slightly, her thighs rubbing together to relieve some of the pressure, her body arching beautifully. He licks his lips. He wants to tear every strap of the red material from her body, kiss the naked expanse of her skin and tease her mercilessly until she is begging him to fuck her at least twice.

She will not like it, him tearing off the gift he just gave her. She doesn’t like when he destroys her clothes, even though she secretly thinks it so very hot. The practical part of her mind always fights desperately against the more animal one - the one that wants to be claimed, possessed and marked at this very moment. 

Her eyes are half-lidded, clouded with desire when she looks at him and moans, causing all his self-resolve to crumble away.  

He’ll buy her another set…

summary:
There are still people out there, who think, that Tony Stark is a Slytherin, and I’m gonna change their mind. 
I’m starting to...
body:
Why Tony Stark is a Ravenclaw

There are still people out there, who think, that Tony Stark is a Slytherin, and I’m gonna change their mind. 

I’m starting to explain, why he perfectly fits the definition of a Ravenclaw. After that I’m gonna explain, why I don’t think, that Slytherin is the right house for him. Please, don’t be offended by any of that, I adore every single house, I just think, that Tony’s not a Slytherin. If that’s still your opinion after all, that’s absolutely fine.

Okay, what is the first thing you get in mind, when you think about Tony Stark? I think it’s very clear, it’s his mind. He is a genius, we’re all aware about it, right? Okay, two of the biggest qualities of a Ravenclaw is their intelligence and their wit. I think, I don’t need to explain, why that fits. 

So, next there’s the wisdom. Well, to be honest, I think Tony’s smart as hell, but he’s not wise. He does a lot of stupid and irrational things, and if you’re going to ask him for an advice, he would probably give you a stupid one. 

Next one are creativity, originality and individuality. Okay, let’s have a look at Iron Man 1. You’ve been captured in a cave with nothing more than a box of scraps. You are forced to build a missile and you are connected to a car battery. Of course you are searching for a way to get out, but what are you gonna do? Try to escape through a tunnel? Try to knock out the guards? Build a weapon or a gun, to shoot your way out?

Not if you’re Tony Stark. He built an armour, the first of its kind. Because he always has his own ways to do things. Always had. That’s why Stark Industries always been so successful, why it was always on the top. Because Tony’s always the first one doing things, he invented so many things, because of his creativity. He built the Iron Man suit all on his own. There’s no one like him and there’s nothing like his mind. Because he is original and individual and I can’t imagine someone, who didn’t see that. 

I don’t know if that’s an official Ravenclaw characteristic, but Pottermore and other websites talking about learning, so let’s check that. This is a fast one, because Tony is always learning new stuff. Remember this scene? From Avengers (2012)? 

Yes, he became an expert in thermonuclear astrophysics over night. Because he learned about it. Just as he learned about the arc-reactor and new elements in Iron Man 2, and a lots of other stuff. Not mentioning how much he learned to get his PhDs. 

I know, the Harry Potter Wiki says there is another quality - acceptance. But I’m not quit sure, what that’s about, I’m not a native english speaker, so if some of you could explain this to me, that would be great. But I think, everyone understands why I think, that Tony fits very good in Ravenclaw. 

Let’s get to the Slytherin part. 

I totally understand, why people get Tony sorted into Slytherin. He has resourcefulness, absolutely. I don’t think anyone can doubt that. And he is clever, no doubt here. 

I would give him the cunning one, although he got tricked by Maya Hansen in Iron Man 3. So I wouldn’t say that’s one of the characteristics of Tony, but I can see, why people are going for it, so that’s okay.  

Ambition and determination are the next ones, and to be honest? I don’t fully agree to that. I mean, he can be ambitious and he can be determined, but I think for that, he gives up to easy sometimes. In Iron Man 2 he would’ve died, if Fury, Phil and Nat didn’t tell him to get up and do something. There are also a view hints in endgame, but I won’t talk about that, because I don’t want to spoil anything. So, I wouldn’t say, ambition and determination are basic qualities of Tony. 

Fraternity is problematic. I won’t say, Tony is a team player. I mean, yeah, he works with the avengers, but it took a while, to get him there. He was always more like a lone wolf, the only exception might be Rhodey. I wouldn’t say he is very fraternal. 

Traditionalism is absolutely none of Tony’s traits, and I don’t think, I have to explain that. He invented a lot of new things, he changed the course of his whole industrie and he didn’t care about traditions at all. Like christmas for example. I mean, did you saw a christmasy Tony in Iron Man 3? Like, the whole movie sets around christmas and I always forget this, because there are no signs. Tony is a very modern person, I’m sure about that. 

Leadership quality. Well, no. I mean, he is good at co-leading, I have to give him that, at least with the avengers. But Tony himself said, that Steve is the boss and it was always Steve who lead the avengers. Because Tonys decisions are too irrational to actually lead things. He cares too little about important stuff, I mean, he was not a great CEO for Stark Industries, that’s why he made Pepper CEO. And because she deserved it ofc. He is not good at diplomacy and moreover, I doubt he wanted to lead anything. I think he doesn’t care for something like that, which brings me to my next point. 

Pursuit of power. I know, that’s not an official one, but it was available on Pottermore and they’re websites, that have that on their lists. So, just wanted to say that power’s nothing, that Tony ever wanted. He was one of the most powerful men on earth, still is, but he gave up on his CEO position. He never became Iron Man because he wanted power, he became Iron Man, because he wanted to do something right.

And last but not least - self preservation. Well, nope, nope, nope. 

Remember the missile from Avengers (2012)?

Remember him giving up his life in Iron Man 2? 

Remember this avengers poster?

Tony always had a self-sacrificing side, he would always lay down on the wire and let the other guys crawl over him. Always. So I don’t give him that. 

So, what does that say?

Tony totally has a few Slytherin traits, but mostly, he has almost every Ravenclaw trait. And I think, the characteristic that pops up in your head, if you’re thinking about Tony is his mind, his intelligence and his individuality. There will never be a second Iron Man. There will never be a second Tony Stark. 

That’s why Tony Stark is a Ravenclaw.

Pursuit of power. I know, that’s not an official one, but it was available on Pottermore and they’re websites, that have that on their lists. So, just wanted to say that power’s nothing, that Tony ever wanted. He was one of the most powerful men on earth, still is, but he gave up on his CEO position. He never became Iron Man because he wanted power, he became Iron Man, because he wanted to do something right.

And last but not least - self preservation. Well, nope, nope, nope. 

Remember the missile from Avengers (2012)?

Remember him giving up his life in Iron Man 2? 

Remember this avengers poster?

Tony always had a self-sacrificing side, he would always lay down on the wire and let the other guys crawl over him. Always. So I don’t give him that. 

So, what does that say?

Tony totally has a few Slytherin traits, but mostly, he has almost every Ravenclaw trait. And I think, the characteristic that pops up in your head, if you’re thinking about Tony is his mind, his intelligence and his individuality. There will never be a second Iron Man. There will never be a second Tony Stark. 

That’s why Tony Stark is a Ravenclaw.

trail.content_raw:
Why Tony Stark is a Ravenclaw

There are still people out there, who think, that Tony Stark is a Slytherin, and I’m gonna change their mind. 

I’m starting to explain, why he perfectly fits the definition of a Ravenclaw. After that I’m gonna explain, why I don’t think, that Slytherin is the right house for him. Please, don’t be offended by any of that, I adore every single house, I just think, that Tony’s not a Slytherin. If that’s still your opinion after all, that’s absolutely fine.

Okay, what is the first thing you get in mind, when you think about Tony Stark? I think it’s very clear, it’s his mind. He is a genius, we’re all aware about it, right? Okay, two of the biggest qualities of a Ravenclaw is their intelligence and their wit. I think, I don’t need to explain, why that fits. 

So, next there’s the wisdom. Well, to be honest, I think Tony’s smart as hell, but he’s not wise. He does a lot of stupid and irrational things, and if you’re going to ask him for an advice, he would probably give you a stupid one. 

Next one are creativity, originality and individuality. Okay, let’s have a look at Iron Man 1. You’ve been captured in a cave with nothing more than a box of scraps. You are forced to build a missile and you are connected to a car battery. Of course you are searching for a way to get out, but what are you gonna do? Try to escape through a tunnel? Try to knock out the guards? Build a weapon or a gun, to shoot your way out?

Not if you’re Tony Stark. He built an armour, the first of its kind. Because he always has his own ways to do things. Always had. That’s why Stark Industries always been so successful, why it was always on the top. Because Tony’s always the first one doing things, he invented so many things, because of his creativity. He built the Iron Man suit all on his own. There’s no one like him and there’s nothing like his mind. Because he is original and individual and I can’t imagine someone, who didn’t see that. 

I don’t know if that’s an official Ravenclaw characteristic, but Pottermore and other websites talking about learning, so let’s check that. This is a fast one, because Tony is always learning new stuff. Remember this scene? From Avengers (2012)? 

Yes, he became an expert in thermonuclear astrophysics over night. Because he learned about it. Just as he learned about the arc-reactor and new elements in Iron Man 2, and a lots of other stuff. Not mentioning how much he learned to get his PhDs. 

I know, the Harry Potter Wiki says there is another quality - acceptance. But I’m not quit sure, what that’s about, I’m not a native english speaker, so if some of you could explain this to me, that would be great. But I think, everyone understands why I think, that Tony fits very good in Ravenclaw. 

Let’s get to the Slytherin part. 

I totally understand, why people get Tony sorted into Slytherin. He has resourcefulness, absolutely. I don’t think anyone can doubt that. And he is clever, no doubt here. 

I would give him the cunning one, although he got tricked by Maya Hansen in Iron Man 3. So I wouldn’t say that’s one of the characteristics of Tony, but I can see, why people are going for it, so that’s okay.  

Ambition and determination are the next ones, and to be honest? I don’t fully agree to that. I mean, he can be ambitious and he can be determined, but I think for that, he gives up to easy sometimes. In Iron Man 2 he would’ve died, if Fury, Phil and Nat didn’t tell him to get up and do something. There are also a view hints in endgame, but I won’t talk about that, because I don’t want to spoil anything. So, I wouldn’t say, ambition and determination are basic qualities of Tony. 

Fraternity is problematic. I won’t say, Tony is a team player. I mean, yeah, he works with the avengers, but it took a while, to get him there. He was always more like a lone wolf, the only exception might be Rhodey. I wouldn’t say he is very fraternal. 

Traditionalism is absolutely none of Tony’s traits, and I don’t think, I have to explain that. He invented a lot of new things, he changed the course of his whole industrie and he didn’t care about traditions at all. Like christmas for example. I mean, did you saw a christmasy Tony in Iron Man 3? Like, the whole movie sets around christmas and I always forget this, because there are no signs. Tony is a very modern person, I’m sure about that. 

Leadership quality. Well, no. I mean, he is good at co-leading, I have to give him that, at least with the avengers. But Tony himself said, that Steve is the boss and it was always Steve who lead the avengers. Because Tonys decisions are too irrational to actually lead things. He cares too little about important stuff, I mean, he was not a great CEO for Stark Industries, that’s why he made Pepper CEO. And because she deserved it ofc. He is not good at diplomacy and moreover, I doubt he wanted to lead anything. I think he doesn’t care for something like that, which brings me to my next point. 

Pursuit of power. I know, that’s not an official one, but it was available on Pottermore and they’re websites, that have that on their lists. So, just wanted to say that power’s nothing, that Tony ever wanted. He was one of the most powerful men on earth, still is, but he gave up on his CEO position. He never became Iron Man because he wanted power, he became Iron Man, because he wanted to do something right.

And last but not least - self preservation. Well, nope, nope, nope. 

Remember the missile from Avengers (2012)?

Remember him giving up his life in Iron Man 2? 

Remember this avengers poster?

Tony always had a self-sacrificing side, he would always lay down on the wire and let the other guys crawl over him. Always. So I don’t give him that. 

So, what does that say?

Tony totally has a few Slytherin traits, but mostly, he has almost every Ravenclaw trait. And I think, the characteristic that pops up in your head, if you’re thinking about Tony is his mind, his intelligence and his individuality. There will never be a second Iron Man. There will never be a second Tony Stark. 

That’s why Tony Stark is a Ravenclaw.

summary:
When Worlds Collide...- Peter Parker x Reader, Barry Allen x Reader, MCU x DCU Crossover.
PART 1
title:
When Worlds Collide...- Peter Parker x Reader, Barry Allen x Reader, MCU x DCU Crossover.
PART 1
body:
Warnings: None.

Summary:  Y/N L/N and Barry Allen were speedsters testing out a device to enhance their speed, but Y/N somehow manages to travel to another Earth where she comes to find out that the Y/N from there is dead and the only people that can help her get back home is the friends and family of her dead doppelganger. She meets Peter Parker, the boyfriend of the late Y/N Stark and emotions are all over the place. He takes her back to the Avengers tower to meet Tony Stark and the Avengers and things get emotional again and weird.

Next Part  - Masterlist

“Barry, I don’t know, if I can run that fast.” You sigh, heavy breaths sounding like your lungs were suffocating. Barry was trying to help you get to Mach 2 under a few seconds and it was harder than it sounded. Training was a real pain in the legs mostly, but it helps.

“Yeah you can Y/N. I believe in you. Come on, just relax okay. Deep breaths-” he says encouragingly, walking towards you, hands extended, pulling you into a hug, rubbing your back soothingly.

“I know I need to do this, and I know that we need to be faster than Zoom but Barry it’s hard.” You grunted, feeling of hopelessness and a hint of fear settling in.

“Hey, it’s okay, we’re gonna be able to do this, okay? I believe in you Y/N, in us.” Barry says as he pulls you closer and you instantly relax at the simple, loving action.

“Guys we need you in the cortex now.” Caitlyn’s voice booms through the speakers, interrupting you both and alerting the two of you of the team meeting, with hopefully good news or any news regarding the other metas in the city.

“Race ya there?” Barry smirks, getting ready to run.

“Oh, you’re so on Flash.” You chuckle, as you both run out of the speed lab, straight to the cortex.

Your relationship with Barry was kind of unusual. You weren’t together but sometimes you both acted like you were? It was a sort of unspoken thing and you guess that the reason that neither of you questioned it or said anything is because, well the both of you didn’t want things to go bad between each other. You were good friends, throughout all the bad stuff that had happened to you both, you were always there for each other. You loved Barry and Barry loved you. When the particle accelerator exploded, Barry and you had gotten your powers, the exact same powers. You were visiting him at his lab at CCPD when it had happened, woke up a few months later and your lives were forever changed. With the good, came the bad, arguments and disagreements with Barry were more often and it wasn’t something either of you liked. But you both worked on it, communicating better, and things have been going well. It has been 3 years and your friendship were still strong, but now it was also a partnership, The Flash and Swift.


“Barry, Y/N, I need you both to take these with you, run somewhere and wait for our signal.” Cisco says as we enter the cortex, handing us the tachyon devices.

Taking the identical devices from Cisco, Barry and you speed change into your suits and sped away, meeting at the Keystone City boarder. Coming to a stop, Barry gives you a nod and you both start to talk to everyone back at S.T.A.R Labs through the comms, waiting for the signal.


“Okay you guys, we’re here, you got our location?” Barry asks through his comms, awaiting a response from Cisco or even Caitlin, as you did too. You were excited to try the tachyon device out, it’s supposed to be like this supercharge battery that well, charges the speed force in us.

Back at S.T.A.R Labs, Cisco asks us, “You good? You guys don’t need to like stretch or somethin’?”


“No no no we’re good, Cisco.” You answer, chuckling at your friend.

“Let’s take this tachyon enhancer out for a test drive.” Cisco says trying to sound cool, Caitlin and Iris standing closely behind him, not wanting to miss anything.


“Alright.” You say as you turn to face Barry. His hands come up to cup your face, fingers lightly brushing your cheeks before he places a gentle kiss to your lips. Pulling away, he nods, gives you a reassuring smile and places the device on his chest, you mimic his actions, jumping a bit at the sudden reaction you feel your body have to it, you feel kind of jittery and well, nervous. You lick your lips and ball up your fists before squeezing your eyes shut as you mentally prepare for the outcome of this.


“Whoo! Yeah!” Barry exhales, feeling the device work.

You have the same reaction; it really does feel like your speed force cells are being supercharged. “Woah, I feel that!” You exhale.


“That is the tachyon device, powering up the speed force in your cells like a quick charge battery.” Caitlin says, sounding very chipper.


“How do you guys feel?” She asks.

“Uh, weird, but in a good way.” You answer, feeling a rush of energy.

“Different, really different.” Barry says with a sweet smile plastered on his face. His excitement was quite evident.


“Let’s see how long it takes for you to get back here, on my count…” Cisco says. That was the signal, well kind of, it was a count-down but same thing. You and Barry, got into position, waiting for that go.


“You ready Flash?” You smirk at the handsome speedster next to you.

“…3..2…”

“As ready as you are Swift.” He grins, shooting you a rather flirty smirk.

“..1..Go!” Cisco says as starts watching the timer on the clock, waiting for Barry and you to return to the S.T.A.R Labs.

Barry and you run, much much faster than before.


“Dang, this thing has them crusin’…” Cisco says, honestly impressed by you guys speed.


“How fast do they normally go?” Iris asks, interested about this whole situation and kind of worried about you and Barry.

“Not this fast.” Caitlin says nonchalantly.

“Not even close, are their vitals okay?” Cisco asks as his eyes widen at how fast the two of you are running around, the city.

Looking at the screen, Caitlin is relieved and kind of impressed, “Yeah, they’re perfect.”


“Cool, it’s like having a pit stop attached to your chest.” Iris says impressed.

“Guys, I can go faster!” You say as you ran throughout the city.

“Yeah, guys, me too!” Barry says.

A grin appears on Cisco’s face as he simply says, “Do it.”


Smiling to yourself you ran, faster that you’ve ever ran before. Hell, probably faster than Barry has too, but you sort of ran so fast that you managed to travel to another Earth. You didn’t know that at first, but you found out eventually.


How did you find that out, well eventually from the guy dressed in a red and blue suit who you saved from a falling building indirectly told you so? After speaking to him for a few minutes you knew for a fact that he wasn’t a meta from Central City.

You had spotted him the moment you came to a stop, scanning the area you, ran up the building, catching him swiftly, like your name sake and ran towards a field, although you didn’t mean too.


“I’m on fire!” the guy exclaims, through his mask as he tried to put the fire out.

“Yeah uh… sorry about that it happens sometimes, with the fiction of running at…” You say but the actions of the guy makes you stop for a moment, you look at him, his suit, head to toe and wonder, who is he and where did he get it, but he has something else to say, something extremely weird but not unbelievable.

“You sound like her.” He says, taking a step back and removing his mask. You examined his face, but sadness clouded his features. He looked at you, but you had your mask on, your identity was still hidden, and it seemed to disappoint him.


“By the way, I didn’t need you to save me.” He grimaced.

You were taken aback by that statement, confused. “Uh, yeah you did, you were falling out of a building, if I hadn’t saved you would be splat.” You say, crossing your arms.


He shakes his head before putting his mask back on, “I-uh have to get back to the city.” He says, turning around and starts swinging in the air. Shooting webs out of his wrists, he moved like a spider. Like the symbol what was on his suit, it made sense.


“What the hell…that’s a new one.” You gape to yourself before you speed towards him. Stopping him at his tracks.


“How did you do that?” You ask the guy; you were so sure that this Central City maybe he was from Keystone? Maybe this was Keystone?


“I-uh…I’m Spider-Man.” He says, puffing his chest out a bit, sounding a bit awkward.

“You sound like her.” He says, taking a step back and removing his mask. You examined his face, but sadness clouded his features. He looked at you, but you had your mask on, your identity was still hidden, and it seemed to disappoint him.


“By the way, I didn’t need you to save me.” He grimaced.

You were taken aback by that statement, confused. “Uh, yeah you did, you were falling out of a building, if I hadn’t saved you would be splat.” You say, crossing your arms.


He shakes his head before putting his mask back on, “I-uh have to get back to the city.” He says, turning around and starts swinging in the air. Shooting webs out of his wrists, he moved like a spider. Like the symbol what was on his suit, it made sense.

[[MORE]]

“Barry, I don’t know, if I can run that fast.” You sigh, heavy breaths sounding like your lungs were suffocating. Barry was trying to help you get to Mach 2 under a few seconds and it was harder than it sounded. Training was a real pain in the legs mostly, but it helps.

“Yeah you can Y/N. I believe in you. Come on, just relax okay. Deep breaths-” he says encouragingly, walking towards you, hands extended, pulling you into a hug, rubbing your back soothingly.

“I know I need to do this, and I know that we need to be faster than Zoom but Barry it’s hard.” You grunted, feeling of hopelessness and a hint of fear settling in.

“Hey, it’s okay, we’re gonna be able to do this, okay? I believe in you Y/N, in us.” Barry says as he pulls you closer and you instantly relax at the simple, loving action.

“Guys we need you in the cortex now.” Caitlyn’s voice booms through the speakers, interrupting you both and alerting the two of you of the team meeting, with hopefully good news or any news regarding the other metas in the city.

“Race ya there?” Barry smirks, getting ready to run.

“Oh, you’re so on Flash.” You chuckle, as you both run out of the speed lab, straight to the cortex.

Your relationship with Barry was kind of unusual. You weren’t together but sometimes you both acted like you were? It was a sort of unspoken thing and you guess that the reason that neither of you questioned it or said anything is because, well the both of you didn’t want things to go bad between each other. You were good friends, throughout all the bad stuff that had happened to you both, you were always there for each other. You loved Barry and Barry loved you. When the particle accelerator exploded, Barry and you had gotten your powers, the exact same powers. You were visiting him at his lab at CCPD when it had happened, woke up a few months later and your lives were forever changed. With the good, came the bad, arguments and disagreements with Barry were more often and it wasn’t something either of you liked. But you both worked on it, communicating better, and things have been going well. It has been 3 years and your friendship were still strong, but now it was also a partnership, The Flash and Swift.


“Barry, Y/N, I need you both to take these with you, run somewhere and wait for our signal.” Cisco says as we enter the cortex, handing us the tachyon devices.

Taking the identical devices from Cisco, Barry and you speed change into your suits and sped away, meeting at the Keystone City boarder. Coming to a stop, Barry gives you a nod and you both start to talk to everyone back at S.T.A.R Labs through the comms, waiting for the signal.


“Okay you guys, we’re here, you got our location?” Barry asks through his comms, awaiting a response from Cisco or even Caitlin, as you did too. You were excited to try the tachyon device out, it’s supposed to be like this supercharge battery that well, charges the speed force in us.

Back at S.T.A.R Labs, Cisco asks us, “You good? You guys don’t need to like stretch or somethin’?”


“No no no we’re good, Cisco.” You answer, chuckling at your friend.

“Let’s take this tachyon enhancer out for a test drive.” Cisco says trying to sound cool, Caitlin and Iris standing closely behind him, not wanting to miss anything.


“Alright.” You say as you turn to face Barry. His hands come up to cup your face, fingers lightly brushing your cheeks before he places a gentle kiss to your lips. Pulling away, he nods, gives you a reassuring smile and places the device on his chest, you mimic his actions, jumping a bit at the sudden reaction you feel your body have to it, you feel kind of jittery and well, nervous. You lick your lips and ball up your fists before squeezing your eyes shut as you mentally prepare for the outcome of this.


“Whoo! Yeah!” Barry exhales, feeling the device work.

You have the same reaction; it really does feel like your speed force cells are being supercharged. “Woah, I feel that!” You exhale.


“That is the tachyon device, powering up the speed force in your cells like a quick charge battery.” Caitlin says, sounding very chipper.


“How do you guys feel?” She asks.

“Uh, weird, but in a good way.” You answer, feeling a rush of energy.

“Different, really different.” Barry says with a sweet smile plastered on his face. His excitement was quite evident.


“Let’s see how long it takes for you to get back here, on my count…” Cisco says. That was the signal, well kind of, it was a count-down but same thing. You and Barry, got into position, waiting for that go.


“You ready Flash?” You smirk at the handsome speedster next to you.

“…3..2…”

“As ready as you are Swift.” He grins, shooting you a rather flirty smirk.

“..1..Go!” Cisco says as starts watching the timer on the clock, waiting for Barry and you to return to the S.T.A.R Labs.

Barry and you run, much much faster than before.


“Dang, this thing has them crusin’…” Cisco says, honestly impressed by you guys speed.


“How fast do they normally go?” Iris asks, interested about this whole situation and kind of worried about you and Barry.

“Not this fast.” Caitlin says nonchalantly.

“Not even close, are their vitals okay?” Cisco asks as his eyes widen at how fast the two of you are running around, the city.

Looking at the screen, Caitlin is relieved and kind of impressed, “Yeah, they’re perfect.”


“Cool, it’s like having a pit stop attached to your chest.” Iris says impressed.

“Guys, I can go faster!” You say as you ran throughout the city.

“Yeah, guys, me too!” Barry says.

A grin appears on Cisco’s face as he simply says, “Do it.”


Smiling to yourself you ran, faster that you’ve ever ran before. Hell, probably faster than Barry has too, but you sort of ran so fast that you managed to travel to another Earth. You didn’t know that at first, but you found out eventually.


How did you find that out, well eventually from the guy dressed in a red and blue suit who you saved from a falling building indirectly told you so? After speaking to him for a few minutes you knew for a fact that he wasn’t a meta from Central City.

You had spotted him the moment you came to a stop, scanning the area you, ran up the building, catching him swiftly, like your name sake and ran towards a field, although you didn’t mean too.


“I’m on fire!” the guy exclaims, through his mask as he tried to put the fire out.

“Yeah uh… sorry about that it happens sometimes, with the fiction of running at…” You say but the actions of the guy makes you stop for a moment, you look at him, his suit, head to toe and wonder, who is he and where did he get it, but he has something else to say, something extremely weird but not unbelievable.

“You sound like her.” He says, taking a step back and removing his mask. You examined his face, but sadness clouded his features. He looked at you, but you had your mask on, your identity was still hidden, and it seemed to disappoint him.


“By the way, I didn’t need you to save me.” He grimaced.

You were taken aback by that statement, confused. “Uh, yeah you did, you were falling out of a building, if I hadn’t saved you would be splat.” You say, crossing your arms.


He shakes his head before putting his mask back on, “I-uh have to get back to the city.” He says, turning around and starts swinging in the air. Shooting webs out of his wrists, he moved like a spider. Like the symbol what was on his suit, it made sense.


“What the hell…that’s a new one.” You gape to yourself before you speed towards him. Stopping him at his tracks.


“How did you do that?” You ask the guy; you were so sure that this Central City maybe he was from Keystone? Maybe this was Keystone?


“I-uh…I’m Spider-Man.” He says, puffing his chest out a bit, sounding a bit awkward.

People had warned Peter about him.

But what they hadn’t told Peter was that he was one of the hottest guys he was ever going to meet.

Clint: I’m sick of covering for your creepy, unnatural relationship, and I shouldn’t have...
body:
Clint: sees Bucky and Tony making out

Clint: I’m sick of covering for your creepy, unnatural relationship, and I shouldn’t have to! I mean, Barnes, you and Steve have been friends forever and you owe it to him to tell him.

Tony to Bucky: Do you really think we’re a creepy, unnatural couple?

Bucky: Come on, doll, that’s a crazy question. I mean, if this relationship wasn’t just a little bit creepy and unnatural, I wouldn’t be in it.

tags: I don't know what I just did
summary: Somewhere in this new MCU there's a universe where Tony Stark lost his wife Pepper and daughter Morgan, and now that there's a...
body: Somewhere in this new MCU there’s a universe where Tony Stark lost his wife Pepper and daughter Morgan, and now that there’s a breach into the multiverse, this Tony finds his way into our universe, where Pepper Potts and Morgan just lost their husband and father, and they all find each other as fate would be, and it’s different yet all the same at the same time, and Jon Favreau directs this movie that he’s co-written with Shane Black. It’s a romantic movie though it has a bit of drama as both Pepper and Tony don’t believe they can be together, not like that, not when Tony’s not really her Tony and she’s not really his Pepper and they don’t have the same history, but they hang together for Morgan, because Morgan knows Tony is her father no matter what and she needs him and Pepper can’t take that away from her - though she tries to cut Tony off at first - and eventually Tony and Pepper go on a date, then connect, then realize yes, wherever you come from, it’s you, it’s the same you, it’s always you. They’re meant to be wherever they come from, so there’s a lot of tears, a lot of confusion, a lot of grief and pain until they learn how to be together again and we see them build their life together, we see them be domestic together, we see Tony’s natural chemistry with Morgan, we see the three of them so naturally and easily acting like a family together. And eventually maybe yes, there can be some action, people coming for Tony to send him back to the universe he comes from, but Tony refuses - “I’m staying in this world” - and the people try to fight him, maybe they’re villains, maybe they have a hold on Tony in their universe, maybe they killed Pepper and Morgan there to control Tony, but he won’t let them take them away from him one more time and he fights them back, and Pepper puts on the Rescue suit - because she won’t let anyone take him away from them again either - and we see them fight side by side again, a real fight scene together this time, not just 2 seconds of it, and there’s a moment at the end where they’re about to lose but the Avengers arrive - Strange, Hulk, Thor, Clint, Peter, maybe even old Steve though that’d be weird. Tony saved everyone’s lives back then in Endgame but this time it’s everyone that fights to protect Tony. He deserves it. Then when the fight is over and they have a little talk, the scene fades in to another scene that shows the characters in the same positions, except the background is different and they wear wedding suits instead. We see Tony and Pepper’s wedding as we should’ve. Morgan is the flower girl. There’s an Iron Man and a Rescue figurines on top of the wedding cake. It’s the same scene, same lake house background, same people we had for Tony’s funeral at the end of Endgame. Except they’re all actually attending a wedding this time.

title: Just Into You
body:
by NotEvenCloseToStraight

In which Tony and Steve meet cute and sort of awkward because it’s fanfiction, Steve is not into guys but he’s definitely into Tony because who the hell isn’t, NatBucky are the scariest murder couple in the world who give zero (0) f*cks about whether or not Steve thinks he’s straight, Sam is quite literally the Least Helpful and Tony is a sassmaster sweetheart with big brown eyes, a ridiculously pretty mouth and the hots for Big, Blonde and Beautiful.

There will be awkward laughs and cheesy moments and movie nights and dry humping (holla!) and a rather generous dose of Gay Panic on Steve’s part and maybe a teaspoon of angst (but that’s why we have a Murder Couple) and then of course, a happily ever after because our boys deserve the best.
